PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DuctSegmentTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Duct segment type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: Shape
PropertyDef.Definition: Cross sectional shape. Note that this shape is uniform throughout the length of the segment. For nonuniform shapes, a transition fitting should be used instead.

PropertyDef.Name: MaterialThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the duct segment material.

PropertyDef.Name: WorkingPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure classification as defined by the authority having jurisdiction (e.g., SMACNA, etc.).

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable maximum and minimum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).

PropertyDef.Name: LongitudinalSeam
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of seam to be used along the longitudinal axis of the duct segment.

PropertyDef.Name: Length
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of the duct segment. If a Length attribute is provided in the occurrence property set, it supersedes this value.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDiameterOrWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter or width of the duct segment. If the list contains only one value, then this nominal diameter or width applies to all ports. For more than value in the list, the nominal diameter or width value applies to the port that corresponds to the list index.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the duct segment. Refer to NominalDiameterOrWidth for comments about interpretation of multiple items in the list.

PropertyDef.Name: EndStyleTreatment
PropertyDef.Definition: The end-style treatment of the duct segment manufactured. If the list contains only one value, then this end-style applies to all ports. For more than one value in the list, the end-style value applies to the port that corresponds to the list index.The following suggested items should be utilized whenever possible for correlation with port enumerations: ANGLE: Angle. BEADEDSLEEVE: Beaded Sleeve. BRAZED: Brazed. COMPRESSION: Compression. CRIMP: Crimp. DRAWBAND: Drawband. DRIVESLIP: Drive slip. FLANGED: Flanged. OUTSIDESLEEVE: Outside Sleeve. SLIPON: Slipon. SOLDERED: Soldered. SSLIP: S-Slip. STANDINGSEAM: Standing seam. SWEDGE: Swedge. WELDED: Welded. NONE: No end-style treatment has been applied. NOTDEFINED: Undefined end-style type.

PropertyDef.Name: Reinforcement
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of reinforcement, if any, used for the duct segment.
